name: AcingTheSchool
description:
A Point n' Click Game About Escaping School.Similar To Riddle School And Henry    Stickmin. Made In 3 Hours In The Free Version Of Construct 3. Takes Like 2 Minutes.You Should Zoom Out.

Did You Do It The First Try? Did You Get All Failures? Did You Get All Easter Eggs? Did You Get The Secret In The Main Men- I Said Too Much.
